awards.text: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 24 nominations.

fullplot: Divorced former First Lady Elaine Barrish is currently serving as the Secretary of State. She finds an unlikely ally in a D.C. journalist who had previously dedicated herself to tearing Barrish to pieces.
plot: A divorced, former First Lady, is currently serving as the Secretary of State. She deals with State Department issues, while trying to keep her family together.
title: Political Animals
